content: preach the gospel at all times when necessary use crochet st francis of assisi sort of * this is a crochet tribute to pope francis i began this design seven years ago and thought it would be a fitting memorial to share it with you all for free pope francis has meant a great deal to so many people religious and otherwise he was a good dude who did his best to live humbly and share god s love with the world he was the first pope to take the name of st francis and emulate the saint s life of poverty and service for me pope francis helped me feel god s love in the midst of severe religious ocd and his message of compassion and inclusion gives me hope for the future of the catholic church he will be very much missed i hope that crocheting a pocket pope will bring you comfort and make you smile like it did for me and i like to think it would amuse pope francis too free pattern available on my blog *the real quote ends with when necessary use words and i think that s exactly what pope francis did
